name: OnePlusTV
0:
”Alexa, turn on OnePlus TV.”
”Alexa, set volume to 15 on OnePlus TV.”
”Alexa, play movie La La Land.”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your OnePlus' Android TV by voice. Turn off OnePlus TV, change the input source on OnePlus TV, control volume and more with Alexa.  

YOU CAN TRY...  
 
POWER ON/OFF OnePlus TV 
"Alexa, turn on OnePlus TV." 
"Alexa, turn off OnePlus TV." 
 
CONTROL VOLUME 
"Alexa, set volume to 15 on OnePlus TV." 
"Alexa, raise/lower/adjust the volume by 20 on OnePlus TV" 
 
MUTE/UNMUTE 
"Alexa, mute OnePlus TV." 
"Alexa, unmute OnePlus TV." 
 
CHANGE CHANNEL 
"Alexa, change channel to 200 on OnePlus TV." 
"Alexa, next channel on OnePlus TV.“ 
"Alexa, change channel to PBS on OnePlus TV. 

CHANGE INPUT 
“Alexa, change input to HDMI 1 on OnePlus TV.” 
“Alexa, change input to Apple TV on OnePlus TV.” 
“Alexa, switch input to HDMI 1 on OnePlus TV.” 
“Alexa, switch input to Apple TV on OnePlus TV.”

NOTE: Saying "Turn on TV" will work only when TV is signed-in with Google account and any Google app has been opened on Y series.
